__e: Oh, Jim-Bob has told me so much about Walton's Mountain I feel like I've been here.
And all our lives, on and off Walton's Mountain were never to be the same.
And I think she is never so happy as when one or all of her grandchildren come to visit in that house on Walton's Mountain.
